1.pT: Setsunaru omoi no yuku sue wa

2.pT: Natsukashiki kioku wa itami to tomo ni

4.pT: Tada hitasuna naru inori no hate ni

5.pT: Atsuki namida, yasashiku kare no kokoro o mitashi...

6.pT: Hikari ni ts没zuru tadashiki michi wa

7.pT: Tsubasa ni kuwareta tamashii wa aishii wagako no yume o miru?

8.pT: Hanbun dake no tamashii ga kanashiki mezame o yobiokosu

9.pT: Tamashii no iro wa eien ni...

10.pT: Sore wa tada hitotsu no tsugunai

12.pT: Itami to iu na no yami wa hitahita to...

13.pT: Hikari aru michi no saki ni mieru mono wa...

14.pT: Tomo ni tatakau riy没... Sen'y没 to yobareru shikaku

15.pT: Anohi, Tashika ni kare to ita

16.pT: Shinjitsu wa hikari no todokanu yami no soko ni

17.pT: Yami no tsubasa no kenzoku wa, fuk么 o matoi, maioriru

18.pT: Yurusazaru mono yami ni obore... Ai suru mono wa namida ni nureru

19.pT: Majiwaranu ai, saredo kienu ai no iku sue wa...

21.pT: Nazeyue ni, nanji, haisha no tobira o kuguru..

22.pT: Sutei no hikari ni michibikare, nozokishimono wa...

23.pT: Kokoron oyami no sono saki ni

24.pT: Ainakimono no seigi wa izuko ni.... Yami ni ubawareshi kokoroyo, eien ni...

25.pT: Shinjitsu wa ikue ni mo tsuranaru kokoro no kanata ni...
